job.title: Data Scientist (Reporting & Insights)
job.description: pstrongResponsibilitiesstrongppnbspppThe Data amp Analytics team provides consumer research data reporting and advanced analytics to understand how consumers interact with our video content amp other products This role will focus primarily on reporting and insight generationpulliApply quantitative expertise ranging from data visualization to advanced statistical modelsliliSupport the analytics needs of clients across the following areasliliData Sourcing amp WarehousingliliData Cleaning amp PreparationliliExploratory Analysis liliVisualizations amp Monitoring Key MetricsliliStatistical AnalysisliliInsight generationliliAssist with the creation of deliverables eg presentations and messaging to business stakeholdersliliEnsure the quality and timeliness of analytic deliverables meet clients expectationsliliContribute and build upon best practices and detailed documentationliulpnbspppstrongQualificationsRequirementsstrongppnbsppulliBachelors in Statistics Mathematics Economics Computer Science or related technical fieldlili3 years of work experience in Business Intelligence Analytics or Data Science spaceliliProficient in Python and databases eg SQL Mongo etcliliExperience with Tableau or similar visualization toolliliKnowledge of statistics and data mining techniques eg Hypothesis testing regression modelingliliProficient in MS Word Excel and PowerPointliulpnbspppstrongDesired CharacteristicsstrongppnbsppulliAbility to develop clear and concise thoughts into recommendations and findingsliliDemonstrated verbal and written communication skills including effective visual representation of complex dataliliExperience communicating results of analyses to leadership teamsliliPrior experience in content digital media andor technologyliulpp
